meta.fee_euro_approx: 60 EUR (approx. 5400 INR) - Free for organized tours (15 days)

add.title: Voucher (For Exemption)
add.description: If staying <15 days via approved agency, a voucher is needed for visa exemption.

steps_flow.title: Check Exemption
steps_flow.description: Indians via approved agency for <15 days are Visa Exempt.

steps_flow.title: Apply (If needed)
steps_flow.description: Apply for 'Visa for Overseas Departments' at VFS France.

steps_flow.title: Submit
steps_flow.description: Submit documents similar to Schengen visa.
